summary: Polar-opposite brothers Randy and Kirk never saw eye-to-eye, but their rivalry is taken to a new level when Randy hijacks Kirk's son's sleepover, taking the boys on a Scout Trip to remember.
cast: Maura Tierney|Patton Oswalt|Rob Riggle|Robert Longstreet|Johnny Knoxville|Patrice O'Neal|Darrell Hammond|Kelly Coffield Park|Eddie Rouse|Nilaja Sun|Regan Mizrahi|Eric Ruffin|Francisco Burgos|Joseph Paul Kennedy|Jack Polick|Joshua Ormond|Santana Pruitt|Jill de Jong|Adam Dorfman|Thiecoura Cissoko|Ivan Dimitrov|Lisa Sample|John Tobias|Serenity Martorell
title: Nature Calls
